{"id":411372054,"lang":"python3","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1603263699,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/411372054/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution:\n    def myPow(self, x: float, n: int) -> float:\n        # O(logn) time | O(1) space\n        def power(a, p):\n            if p == 0:\n                return 1\n            if p == 1:\n                return a\n            return power(a, p//2) * power(a, p//2) if p % 2 == 0 else a * power(a, p - 1)\n        \n        ans = power(x, abs(n))\n        return ans if n >= 0 else 1/ans\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
